content.raw:
@{557058:14b7fd50-d65a-47a8-825c-fa89681d07bd} What version of ign-gazebo are you using? I seem to have the following installed

```shell
$ dpkg -l | grep ignition-gazebo                                                               
ii  ignition-gazebo2                              2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic                          amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Binaries
ii  libignition-gazebo:amd64                      1.1.0-1~bionic                               amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Shared library
ii  libignition-gazebo-dev:amd64                  1.1.0-1~bionic                               amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Development files
ii  libignition-gazebo-plugins:amd64              1.1.0-1~bionic                               amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Plugins
ii  libignition-gazebo2:amd64                     2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic                          amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Shared library
ii  libignition-gazebo2-dev:amd64                 2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic                          amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Development files
ii  libignition-gazebo2-plugins:amd64             2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic                          amd64        Ignition Gazebo classes and functions for robot apps - Plugins
```

‌

Realizing this puts me on the pre-release, e.g., 

```
$ apt-cache policy ignition-gazebo2                                                               
ignition-gazebo2:
  Installed: 2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic
  Candidate: 2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic
  Version table:
 *** 2.2.0~pre1-1~bionic 500
        500 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-prerelease bionic/main amd64 Packages
        100 /var/lib/dpkg/status
     2.1.0-1~bionic 500
        500 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable bionic/main amd64 Packages
```
